articles.title: Bolt.new Hits $40M ARR with 25,000 Daily Apps Built
articles.content: StackBlitz's Bolt.new reaches $40M annual recurring revenue with developers building 25,000 applications daily on the platform.
articles.summary: StackBlitz's Bolt.new reaches $40M annual recurring revenue with developers building 25,000 applications daily on the platform....

articles.title: Codeium In Talks to Raise $2.85 Billion Valuation
articles.content: Codeium, an AI-powered coding startup, is in talks to raise a $2.85 billion valuation. The company enhances productivity by providing intelligent code completion, refactoring, and debugging support through seamless integration into various IDEs.
articles.summary: Codeium, an AI-powered coding startup, is in talks to raise a $2.85 billion valuation. The company enhances productivity by providing intelligent code completion, refactoring, and debugging support through seamless integration into various IDEs.

articles.title: Codeium revenue, valuation & funding | Sacra
articles.content: Codeium hit $40M ARR in February 2025, up from $12M at the end of 2024. The company employs a freemium model, offering a generous free tier to individual developers while monetizing through enterprise contracts.
articles.summary: Codeium hit $40M ARR in February 2025, up from $12M at the end of 2024. The company employs a freemium model, offering a generous free tier to individual developers while monetizing through enterprise contracts.

articles.title: Lovable Raises $15M After Spectacular Growth to 800K Users
articles.content: Swedish AI app builder Lovable has raised $15 million in pre-Series A funding after growing to 800,000 users building 25,000 apps daily.
articles.summary: Swedish AI app builder Lovable has raised $15 million in pre-Series A funding after growing to 800,000 users building 25,000 apps daily.

articles.title: Anthropic launches a new AI model that 'thinks' as long as you want
articles.content: Anthropic released Claude 3.7 Sonnet, a new AI model that can 'think' about questions for varying lengths of time. The model is designed to provide both real-time and more considered answers, representing a 'hybrid AI reasoning model' approach.
articles.summary: Anthropic released Claude 3.7 Sonnet, a new AI model that can 'think' about questions for varying lengths of time. The model is designed to provide both real-time and more considered answers, representing a 'hybrid AI reasoning model' approach.

articles.title: Moderne raises $30m Series B to accelerate AI-powered code transformation
articles.content: Moderne, a company specializing in automated code refactoring and analysis, has secured $30m in a Series B funding round. The investment was led by Acrew Capital, with participation from Morgan Stanley, Amex Ventures, and TIAA Ventures. Existing investors also joined the round.
articles.summary: Moderne, a company specializing in automated code refactoring and analysis, has secured $30m in a Series B funding round. The investment was led by Acrew Capital, with participation from Morgan Stanley, Amex Ventures, and TIAA Ventures. Existing investors also joined the round.

articles.title: Bolt.new Enables Mobile App Development Without Code
articles.content: StackBlitz's Bolt.new adds mobile app development capabilities, allowing users to create iOS and Android applications entirely through natural language.
articles.summary: StackBlitz's Bolt.new adds mobile app development capabilities, allowing users to create iOS and Android applications entirely through natural language....

articles.title: Moderne Secures $30M to Drive Billions in Enterprise Code Modernization Savings – Based on Its Innovative Tech Used by AWS, Microsoft, and Broadcom AI Assistants
articles.content: Moderne, the automated code refactoring and analysis company, announced it has closed $30 million in Series B funding led by Acrew Capital. The funding is further validation that Moderne is emerging as the only company driving mass-scale code modernization and tech debt remediation critical to the progress and success of enterprises and hyperscalers.
articles.summary: Moderne, the automated code refactoring and analysis company, announced it has closed $30 million in Series B funding led by Acrew Capital. The funding is further validation that Moderne is emerging as the only company driving mass-scale code modernization and tech debt remediation critical to the progress and success of enterprises and hyperscalers.

articles.title: Firebase Studio Impressive Growth Overshadowed by Preview Phase Limitations
articles.content: Despite reaching 1.5 million workspaces in its first month, Google's Firebase Studio remains stuck in preview phase with users reporting significant limitations in production readiness and feature completeness.
articles.summary: Despite reaching 1.5 million workspaces in its first month, Google's Firebase Studio remains stuck in preview phase with users reporting significant limitations in production readiness and feature completeness.
